channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stormy Daniels finishes testifying in Trump trial
item.description: Donald Trump's criminal hush money trial continues in New York. Follow here for the latest live news updates, analysis and more.

item.title: Trump trial live updates: Judge, slamming defense, denies 2nd motion for mistrial
item.description: Follow the latest developments in former President Donald Trump's criminal hush money trial in New York.

item.title: Devastation in Gaza as Israel wages war on Hamas
item.description: President Joe Biden told CNN on Wednesday he would halt some shipments of US weapons to Israel if Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu ordered a major invasion of the city of Rafah. Follow for live updates.

item.title: 2 skiers still missing in avalanche; 1 digs himself out: Police
item.description: A search is underway for two skiers missing in an avalanche on Lone Peak outside Salt Lake City, Utah, according to the Unified Police Department of Salt Lake City.

item.title: Man sentenced to 27 years for stabbing 3 officers in Times Square on New Year's Eve
item.description: Trevor Bickford was sentenced to 27 years in federal prison for a "brazen" 2022 New Year's Eve knife attack that seriously injured three NYPD officers, the DOJ said.

item.title: 2 men charged in connection with the fatal shooting of a 1-year-old boy in New York
item.description: Dashawn Austin and Akeem Artis were two of 18 charged in a 63-count indictment for gang-related activity including multiple counts of murder and weapons charges.

item.title: Brazilian horse stranded on a roof by floods is rescued after stirring the nation
item.description: About 24 hours after it was first spotted and with people clamoring for the rescue of a horse social media users nicknamed Caramelo, a team in Brazilâ€™s Rio Grande do Sul state have successfully removed Caramelo, providing a dose of hope to a beleaguere...

item.title: May 8, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: US President Joe Biden told CNN on Wednesday he would halt some shipments of American weapons to Israel if Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu ordered a major invasion of the city of Rafah.

item.title: WATCH: Previously paralyzed dog realizes he can walk again
item.description: Bo has a real underdog story.
